birth_place.zh-cn: 河南江北等处行中书省安丰路濠州怀远县
birth_place.en: Huaiyuan County, Haozhou, Anfeng Circuit, Henan Jiangbei Xingsheng

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国名将。体貌奇伟，勇力绝伦，猿臂善射，统军有方。官至中书平章军国重事，兼太子少保，封鄂国公。北伐中原时暴卒军中，追封开平王，谥号忠武。
description.en: Founding general of the Ming Dynasty. Known for his exceptional bravery and military skill. He held high positions such as Grand Marshal and Junior Guardian of the Crown Prince, and was enfeoffed as the Duke of E. He died suddenly during the northern expedition against the Yuan and was posthumously created Prince of Kaiping with the posthumous name Zhongwu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝，明太祖。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty, Emperor Taizu of Ming.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春的妻子，蓝玉的姐姐。
description.en: Wife of Chang Yuchun and elder sister of Lan Yu.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Chang Yuchun.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春次子。
description.en: Second son of Chang Yuchun.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春三子。
description.en: Third son of Chang Yuchun.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春长女，明朝太子朱标的正妃。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Chang Yuchun and the primary consort of Crown Prince Zhu Biao of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋长子，明朝第一位皇太子。
description.en: Eldest son of Zhu Yuanzhang and the first crown prince of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国将领，常遇春的妻弟。
description.en: A founding general of the Ming Dynasty, brother-in-law of Chang Yuchun.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国名将，与常遇春同为朱元璋麾下最重要的将领之一。
description.en: A founding general of the Ming Dynasty, one of the most important commanders under Zhu Yuanzhang alongside Chang Yuchun.

description.zh-cn: 元末群雄之一，建立陈汉政权，与朱元璋争夺天下。
description.en: A warlord during the late Yuan Dynasty who established the Chen Han regime and contended with Zhu Yuanzhang for control of China.

description.zh-cn: 元末群雄之一，建立吴政权，与朱元璋争夺天下。
description.en: A warlord during the late Yuan Dynasty who established the state of Wu and contended with Zhu Yuanzhang for control of China.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋麾下将领，后因图谋兵变被处死。
description.en: A general under Zhu Yuanzhang who was later executed for plotting a coup.

description.zh-cn: 元末群盗首领。
description.en: A leader of bandits during the late Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元朝末年重要将领。
description.en: An important general during the late Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元朝最后一位皇帝。
description.en: The last emperor of the Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个由汉族建立的大一统王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China established by the Han people.

nodes.id: 河南江北等处行中书省

zh-cn: 河南江北等处行中书省

description.zh-cn: 元朝的行中书省之一，常遇春的出生地所在。
description.en: One of the branch secretariats of the Yuan Dynasty, where Chang Yuchun was born.

description.zh-cn: 元末朱元璋和陈友谅为争夺鄱阳湖水域而进行的一场战略决战。
description.en: A decisive strategic battle between Zhu Yuanzhang and Chen Youliang for control of the Lake Poyang region during the late Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初年由朱元璋发起，徐达、常遇春等人领导的旨在推翻元朝统治的军事行动。
description.en: A military campaign initiated by Zhu Yuanzhang in the early Ming Dynasty, led by Xu Da, Chang Yuchun, and others, aimed at overthrowing the Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 至正十五年（1355年），常遇春归附朱元璋，自请为前锋，成为其麾下重要将领，直至去世。
description.en: In 1355, Chang Yuchun joined Zhu Yuanzhang, volunteering as a vanguard, and became one of his key generals until his death.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春的妻子是蓝氏。
description.en: Chang Yuchun's wife was Lady Lan.

description.zh-cn: 常茂是常遇春的长子。
description.en: Chang Mao is the eldest son of Chang Yuchun.

description.zh-cn: 常升是常遇春的次子。
description.en: Chang Sheng is the second son of Chang Yuchun.

description.zh-cn: 常森是常遇春的三子。
description.en: Chang Sen is the third son of Chang Yuchun.

description.zh-cn: 敬懿皇太子妃是常遇春的长女。
description.en: Crown Princess Jingyi is the eldest daughter of Chang Yuchun.

description.zh-cn: 洪武四年四月，常氏被册封为皇太子妃，成为朱标的正妃。
description.en: In April of the fourth year of the Hongwu era (1371), Lady Chang was officially invested as the Crown Princess, becoming the primary consort of Zhu Biao.

description.zh-cn: 蓝玉是常遇春的妻弟。
description.en: Lan Yu was the younger brother of Chang Yuchun's wife.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春多次跟随徐达作战，两人是朱元璋麾下最重要的将领，共同领导北伐等重大军事行动。
description.en: Chang Yuchun frequently fought alongside Xu Da. They were the most important generals under Zhu Yuanzhang and jointly led major military campaigns such as the Northern Expedition.

position.en: Deputy General for the Northern Expedition

description.zh-cn: 至正二十七年十月，徐达被授为征虏大将军，常遇春被授为征虏副将军，随其北伐。
description.en: In October 1367, Xu Da was appointed as the General-in-chief for the Northern Expedition, and Chang Yuchun was appointed as his deputy general.

description.zh-cn: 在鄱阳湖之战中，常遇春协同诸将作战，最终击败并导致陈友谅战死。
description.en: During the Battle of Lake Poyang, Chang Yuchun fought alongside other generals, ultimately defeating and causing the death of Chen Youliang.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春作为副将军，率军攻破平江城，俘虏了张士诚。
description.en: As deputy general, Chang Yuchun led his troops to capture the city of Pingjiang and took Zhang Shicheng prisoner.

description.zh-cn: 在邵荣图谋兵变事败后，朱元璋本想赦免其死罪，但常遇春坚决反对，认为谋反不可原谅，最终导致邵荣被处死。
description.en: After Shao Rong's coup plot was exposed, Zhu Yuanzhang intended to pardon him from death, but Chang Yuchun resolutely opposed it, arguing that rebellion was unforgivable, which ultimately led to Shao Rong's execution.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春早年曾为刘聚麾下，后因察觉刘聚不能成事而离开。
description.en: In his early years, Chang Yuchun served under Liu Ju, but left after realizing Liu was incapable of achieving great things.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春与徐达进攻太原时，趁夜袭击王保保（扩廓帖木儿）的军队，使其仓皇逃走，并俘获其四万士兵。
description.en: When attacking Taiyuan with Xu Da, Chang Yuchun launched a night raid on Wang Baobao's (Köke Temür) army, forcing him to flee in disarray and capturing 40,000 of his soldiers.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春随徐达攻破元大都（1368年），迫使元顺帝北逃；后又率军攻占元上都（1369年），元顺帝再逃奔和林。
description.en: Chang Yuchun, along with Xu Da, conquered the Yuan capital Dadu (1368), forcing Emperor Shun of Yuan to flee north; he later led his army to capture Shangdu (1369), forcing the emperor to flee again to Karakorum.

position.zh-cn: 开国名将、鄂国公、太子少保、中书平章军国重事、征虏副将军
position.en: Founding General, Duke of E, Junior Guardian of the Crown Prince, Grand Marshal, Deputy General for the Northern Expedition

description.zh-cn: 常遇春是明朝的开国功臣。
description.en: Chang Yuchun was a founding father of the Ming Dynasty.

relationships.target: 河南江北等处行中书省

description.zh-cn: 常遇春出生于河南江北等处行中书省安丰路濠州怀远县。
description.en: Chang Yuchun was born in Huaiyuan County, Haozhou, Anfeng Circuit, Henan Jiangbei Xingsheng.

description.zh-cn: 常遇春被授为征虏副将军，随徐达北伐，是北伐的主要领导者之一。
description.en: Chang Yuchun was appointed as the Deputy General for the Northern Expedition, accompanying Xu Da, and was one of the main leaders of the campaign.

description.zh-cn: 陈友谅在鄱阳湖之战中被朱元璋军击败，本人中流矢而死。
description.en: Chen Youliang was defeated by Zhu Yuanzhang's forces in the Battle of Lake Poyang and was killed by a stray arrow.
